G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
The Game class is used to maintain each game that is played.
Game(Difficulty) - Constructor for class Game
Game constructor generates a game based on the difficulty selected in the Options class, stores its solutions and initialises its history.
game - Static variable in class MainMenu

Generates the GUI used for the board, contained within a JPanel
